item.description: Omarion Hampton rushed for a five-yard touchdown that gave the Los Angeles Chargers a 34-17 lead over the Dallas Cowboys.

item.title: Jay Glazer: The Moment That Changed Bears' Season and Led to Epic Win vs. Packers
item.description: The Bears' comeback victory over the Packers on Saturday was nearly two months in the making, FOX Sports NFL insider Jay Glazer shared.

item.title: Should Group of 5 Teams get automatic bids to CFP? Joel Klatt thinks they shouldn't
item.description: Joel Klatt discussed why he believe Group of 5 teams shouldn't get an automatic bid to the College Football Playoff.

item.title: Panthers' Bryce Young scrambles & finds Ja'Tavion Sanders for go-ahead TD against Buccaneers | NFL Highlights
item.description: Carolina Panthers' Bryce Young scrambled & found Ja'Tavion Sanders for the go-ahead touchdown against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
